attributes.action: encourage the entire cabinet to resign over expenses fiasco.  We would also like to see all responsible persons prosecuted as they would be in the public sector.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The expenses fiasco is embarrassing to our Government.  We place our trust in our leaders NOT to defraud the very public they purport to work for.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
